text: 2.16 Mat 23.32-33, 24.6, Luk 11.52, Apo 13.50 Pen binɨb Juda mel okok, kɨli God nop gos nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl kɨlop agñun agon, Juda bɨ anɨb okok chɨnop Mel agɨlak. Taynen? Kɨli binɨb Juda mel okok God kɨlop ma adɨkɨd dɨnɨmuŋ agɨl nɨgɨlak. Tap tɨmel anɨb okok pelpel jɨmñɨl anɨgɨpal ak God ne nɨŋɨd, kɨlop gos tɨmel nɨŋɨd yul awl ñek mɨŋel awl yɨbɨl ak kɨlop dup.
